modName: Esmera and Kia Supermodel Warrior Princesses
descriptionHtml:
Esmera is a Breton, Kia is a Nord and they might as well be sisters.  Two level 1 saves of good lookin ladies for your adventuring.  Several mods are required to maintain this look and I have absolutely no idea what they look like without them, so fair warning.  

Required mods :
1) Better Females by Bella
2) Natural Eyes
3) Believable Hair
4) Caliente\'s CBBE (optional)

If you want to change names, colors, or whatever just type ~(tilde) to open the console and type showracemenu.  Close the console, make changes and done.  If you do this beyond level 1 it might cause issues so make sure you know what you\'re doing.

note: the screens for Kia are from my own, later game.  Same character but the save is for level 1.
author: syrik77
